one_sentence_value_prop: Flicklet is a modern TV and movie tracking web application with a Netflix-style interface that helps users discover, track, and manage their entertainment consumption across movies and TV shows, with personalized recommendations, daily games, and community features.
primary_audience: TV and movie enthusiasts who want to track what they watch, discover new content, and organize their entertainment consumption
secondary_audience: Casual viewers, students, and professionals who want a simple, organized way to manage their watchlists and discover personalized recommendations
core_workflow: Users browse trending content and movies in theaters, add shows/movies to watchlists (Currently Watching, Want to Watch, Watched), track individual episodes, play daily games (FlickWord word-guessing, Trivia questions), discover personalized recommendations based on customizable genre preferences (3 rows with main+subgenre combinations), view theater showtimes near them, and manage custom lists. All data syncs across devices when signed in.
output_types: Watchlists (Currently Watching, Want to Watch, Watched)
Custom lists (up to 3 for free, unlimited for Pro)
Game statistics (FlickWord accuracy, streaks; Trivia performance)
Personalized recommendation rows (3 customizable genre combinations)
Data exports (JSON format, CSV coming for Pro)
pricing_mentioned: Free while in alpha/beta. Pro features available via testing toggle in Settings. Payment integration (Stripe, iOS App Store, Google Play) planned but not yet implemented. Pro features include: unlimited custom lists, advanced notifications (precise timing, email), extra trivia questions (30 vs 10), advanced community sorting, multi-topic filtering, bloopers/extras access, episode tracking in condensed view.
roadmap_highlights: Social Features - friend connections, shared watchlists, activity feed, recommendations (Coming Soon)
founder_comments: Pro features are currently in alpha/testing phase with a toggle in Settings → Pro tab. Payment integration framework is built (Stripe, iOS, Android) but not yet connected to real payment providers. Users can enable Pro via Settings toggle for testing. The app has a three-fold personality system (Regular, Semi-Sarcastic, Severely Sarcastic) and supports English and Spanish. Free users get: 3 custom lists, 1 FlickWord game/day, 10 Trivia questions/day, 3 community posts/day, 10 comments/day, basic notifications. Pro users get unlimited lists, 3 games/day, 30 trivia questions/day, advanced notifications, email notifications, precise timing controls, advanced community features.
